summary.span: 实现 Vbc 任务。

span.span: Implements the Vbc task.

summary.span: 使用项目文件中的 Vbc 元素创建和执行此任务。

span.span: Use the Vbc element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 有关用法和参数信息，请参阅 Vbc 任务。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see Vbc Task.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ErrorReport { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ErrorReport : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串值，该值指定任务将如何报告内部编译器错误。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that specifies how the task will report internal compiler errors.

value.span: 指定任务将如何报告内部编译器错误的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that specifies how the task will report internal compiler errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以有下列值：This property can have the following values: - `prompt` - `send` - `none` 如果指定了 `prompt`，且发生内部编译器错误，则会提示用户选择是否将错误数据发送给 Microsoft。If `prompt` is specified and an internal compiler error occurs, the user is prompted with an option of whether to send the error data to Microsoft. 如果指定了 `send`，且发生内部编译器错误，则该任务会向 Microsoft 发送错误数据。If `send` is specified and an internal compiler error occurs, the task sends the error data to Microsoft. 默认值是 `none`，它仅在文本输出中报告错误。The default value is `none`, which reports errors in text output only.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void LogEventsFromTextOutput (string singleLine, Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance messageImportance);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void LogEventsFromTextOutput(string singleLine, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance messageImportance) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub LogEventsFromTextOutput (singleLine As String, messageImportance As MessageImportance)
protected: override void LogEventsFromTextOutput(System::String ^ singleLine, Microsoft::Build::Framework::MessageImportance messageImportance);

param.name: singleLine
param.span: 从 vbc 编译器的 STDOUT 捕获的单行

span.span: A single line captured from the STDOUT of the vbc compiler

param.name: messageImportance
param.span: 消息的重要性：高、低或正常

span.span: The message importance: High,Low, or Normal

summary.span: 此方法截获要记录的来自 VBC 的 STDOUT 的行。

span.span: This method intercepts the lines to be logged coming from STDOUT from VBC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦看到标准 vb 警告或错误，接下来，我们捕获并抓住接下来的三行，这样我们就可以将文件名 .vb (行) 的格式转换为 FileName .vb (行) ，这将允许我们向 IDE 报告行和列，并因此在重复的情况下为多目标筛选错误，或者只是对适当的标记（而不是整行）进行波形。Once we see a standard vb warning or error, then we capture it and grab the next 3 lines so we can transform the string form the form of FileName.vb(line) to FileName.vb(line,column) which will allow us to report the line and column to the IDE, and thus filter the error in the duplicate case for multi-targeting, or just squiggle the appropriate token instead of the entire line.

member this.OptionCompare : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串值，该值指定字符串的比较方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that specifies how string comparisons are made.

value.span: 指定如何进行字符串比较的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that specifies how string comparisons are made.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以有下列值：This property can have the following values: - `binary` - `text` 值 `binary` 指定该任务使用二进制字符串比较。The value `binary` specifies that the task uses binary string comparisons. 值 `text` 指定该任务使用文本字符串比较。The value `text` specifies that the task uses text string comparisons. 默认值为 `binary`。The default value is `binary`.
